alert.note: Alert for Live Oak; McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 8:26PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central McMullen and west central Live Oak Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 826 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Three Rivers, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Three Rivers, Choke Canyon, Calliham, Oakville, Simmons and Ray Point. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 65 and 78. US Highway 281 between mile markers 618 and 628. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
